The evolution of human life would take a different path if humans could breathe underwater. We would likely develop-limbs and-organs to adapt to the new environment.
The oceans would become a more habitable place for humans, and we would be able to explore and live in areas that are currently inaccessible.
Underwater agriculture could become a reality, allowing us to grow crops and sustain ourselves in the ocean.
Humans would-develop-technology to-survive and thrive in the ocean, such as submersibles and underwater habitats.
The ocean would become a-source of energy, as we could harness the power of waves and currents to generate electricity.
